mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lamp on railing with house numbers

composed of three row houses: first house built 1853, two more added and renovated into one structure, 1884-1915. Purchased 1962 by the Engineering Society; restored 1962-1971 and now used as Society headquarters and as public performance and event space. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Garrett_Jacobs_Mansion [work]
